column4: i am installing tftpd-hpa using synpatic, but it says, it's not authenticated.  anyone have experience with this?
it's not big deal if it's not auth, depending on the repo you're getting it from there may be a cert you can download
what't the command to update package list? i can't download tftp-hpa.
i think the repository is dead, i clicked apply, nothing happens
think about changes your sources to a different mirrot
you can either edit /etc/apt/sources.list (backup files first)
hm.. not working here. do you mind try to install tftp-hpa on your system?
something funny in your part of town apparently
